similar.title: Sensex falls over 150 pts, Nifty below 25,150; auto, metal stocks top drags
similar.description: Indian equity markets edged lower on Wednesday, mirroring Asian market trends after the US inflation data release. Investors are exercising caution ahead of key corporate earnings reports and developments in US trade talks. Sectorally, auto, metal, and financial services faced declines, while Dixon Technologies surged following an acquisition announcement.

similar.title: ICICI Bank, SBI among top picks as banking sector prepares for earnings rebound; Motilal Oswal sees 12-15% upside
similar.description: Indias banking sector is adapting to a low interest rate regime, with temporary NIM compression but improving liquidity, falling deposit costs, and resilient asset quality likely to drive margin recovery and earnings rebound from H2 FY26 onward.
